item.title: Help with starter command
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

if (command.startsWith("starter")) if (hasegg == 0) { hasegg = 1; addItem(995,1000000); addItem(1076,1); addItem(1087,1); addItem(1103,1); addItem(1117,1); addItem(1139,1); addItem(1155,1); addItem(1173,1); addItem(1189,1); addItem(1205,1); addItem(1277,1); addItem(1291,1); sendMessage("Theres your starter kit! Happy?"); } else if(hasegg == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "In conclusion to trying to get another starter..."; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = +playerName+" is now the new n33b of the day!"; }
I think that’s it. I may have gotten the messageToAll ending wrong :\

Read full topic

item.title: Help with starter command
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

I am trying to make a starter command that can only be used once. Here is what I have so far.

else if (command.startsWith("starter")) { addItem(995,1000000); addItem(1076,1); addItem(1087,1); addItem(1103,1); addItem(1117,1); addItem(1139,1); addItem(1155,1); addItem(1173,1); addItem(1189,1); addItem(1205,1); addItem(1277,1); addItem(1291,1); sendMessage("Theres your starter kit! Happy?"); }

Wha could i do to make it so it can be only used once and if you use it more then onceit sends a message to everyone.

Read full topic
